name: Untitled Submission - Global Game Jam 2017
description:
My attempt at Global Game Jam 2017. Tried to balance working my job on Friday and Saturday 4pm-10pm with working solo on the game. Not a great idea. Essentially threw in the towel Saturday morning and then rekindled my energy Saturday night to create this: something I thought might be a bit relaxing.

Here is what I threw together while just relaxing and making some pixel animations and some simple work on programming. Nothing major. Just a simple toy about eroding rocks.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move and light up all the rocks!

Art and programming by me

Light SFX from Wind Waker.
